member.name: AUDCLNT_SHAREMODE
member.summary: The AUDCLNT_SHAREMODE enumeration defines constants that indicate whether an audio stream will run in shared mode or in exclusive mode.

member.name: AUDCLNT_SHAREMODE.AUDCLNT_SHAREMODE_SHARED
member.summary: The audio stream will run in shared mode. For more information, see Remarks.

member.name: AUDCLNT_SHAREMODE.AUDCLNT_SHAREMODE_EXCLUSIVE
member.summary: The audio stream will run in exclusive mode. For more information, see Remarks.
